title: What is Focus and how does it work?
answer:
## What is Focus and how does it work?

Focus is an app to help you focus in real life, it blocks pre-selected apps during a time interval.

title: Focus requires login or registration to work?
answer:
## Focus requires login or registration to work?

No, Focus does not require login or registration, Focus is all about the use-to-go principle. Only advanced features require a subscription.

title: How do I set up a focus plan?
answer:
## How do I set up a focus plan?

Its very simple, in the "Plans" tab, touch in "+ New Plan" and enter the time interval, days of the week and the apps that should be blocked. Remember, the minimum blocking time is 15 minutes and the max is 24 hours.

title: What happens when I block an app?
answer:
## What happens when I block an app?

The app cannot be used until time runs out or the focus plan is disabled or deleted.

title: What features are included in the free version vs. the subscription?
How can I change or cancel my subscription?
answer:
## How can I change or cancel my subscription?

You can access the subscription screen in **Settings > Premium Account**, in this screen you will can canceld, restore and change you plan.

title: Will Focus collect or store my personal data?
answer:
## Will Focus collect or store my personal data?

The **Focus** app **does not collect any personal data** that could identify the user. We do not request, store, or process information such as name, address, email, phone number, or any other personally identifiable data.

Additionally, the app **does not require any type of registration or login** for use.

Read more in the **Privacy Policy**.

title: How do I troubleshoot issues with the app?
answer:
## How do I troubleshoot issues with the app?

You should send an email to **[adrianosouzacostaios@gmail.com](mailto:adrianosouzacostaios@gmail.com)** describling step by step how to reproduce the bug. The Focus team will respond quickly.

title: Can I use Focus across multiple devices?
answer:
## Can I use Focus across multiple devices?

Yes! All plans are sync to your iCloud, so all devices synced with your iCloud will receive the plans and subscription status.

title: What happens if I uninstall Focus?
answer:
## What happens if I uninstall Focus?

All apps will be unlocked and focus plan rules will be disable, but your data will saved in your iCloud.
